title: Mini Games
subtitle: Choose a game to start the challenge

skillcheck.name: Skill Check
skillcheck.desc: Classic QTE from Dead by Daylight, press Space when the pointer passes the green zone

tempres.name: TEMPRES
tempres.desc: Rhythm challenge, each tap interval must be longer than the previous one

skillCheckHint: Click the ring or press Space
tempresDesc: Each tap interval must be longer than the previous one - slow down gradually
tempresHint: Click or press Space to start
